Proxy string builder

Configure your proxy settings and location targeting to generate a ready-to-use proxy string.

Select the optimal region for your proxy connection.

Protocol you will use in your app or tool.

Location targeting (optional)

Append keys like _region-, _country-, _city- to your base password.

Final password with location configuration (preview only):

YqkKFSHSyKqElVgw

Resulting proxy string

This is the final string in the HOST:PORT:USERNAME:PASSWORD format that you can paste into your tools.

geo.iproyal.com:11200:2uKBzjY2DetgdCEv:YqkKFSHSyKqElVgw

Proxy list generator

Create multiple proxy lines from the current configuration and view them separated as Host / Port / User / Pass.

Each proxy gets a unique 8-char _session-* ID for sticky IP.

Access fastest & most reliable proxies. Adds _streaming-1

Skip ISP static proxies. Adds _skipispstatic-1
